name: No oil French Toast
description: This No oil French Toast recipe is perfect for those who are on a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet. Healthyfied to ensure you can enjoy a classic breakfast option without compromising on your health goals. Easy to make and deliciously satisfying, this recipe is a great way to start your day the healthy way!

recipeInstructions.text: Crack the large egg into a bowl and whisk thoroughly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1 tsp of honey to the egg and continue to whisk until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Dip each slice of sugar free wheat bread into the egg mixture, making sure both sides are well coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Place the bread slices on the pan and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
